title: How do printer companies prevent people from buying cheaper, 3rd party ink cartridges? - Quora

response.answer_text: By inserting a chip For HP ink cartridges they have chip that will not clear the error message when ink is low. The refill company must change the chip in order to print and may not be able to clear the message. I have verified this by refilling my empty cartridges at FRY’s Electronics You can save half or more depending on the cartridge.
